images.caption: Porth Reservoir. The reservoir lies just west of the village and includes a nature trail with lots of wildlife to see.

description: This Cornish town is located near Wadebridge and the coast at Newquay. Local walking highlights include the waterside trails at Porth Reservoir and the wildlife rich Goss Moor Trail. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around St Columb Major. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: For cyclists National Cycle Route 32 passes right through the town. The signed Sustrans cycle route runs through Cornwall from Bodmin to Truro via St. Columb Major, Padstow and Newquay.

display_address: Trekenning Road, Higher Trekenning, Gluvian, St. Columb Major, Cornwall, England, TR9 6RZ, United Kingdom
